'''"Beginning"''' is an album-exclusive song composed by [[C418]] that only appears on ''[[Minecraft - Volume Alpha]]''.

== Track description ==
"Beginning" is a nuanced remix of "Minecraft", played by synths and a piano, with a choir singing in the background.

A sequel to this track, "[[Beginning 2]]", would be used in-game as part of the [[main menu]].
